---
title: "Gallery"
---

<div class="gallery-grid">
  <div class="album-thumbnail" data-album="album1">
    <img src="path/to/thumbnail1.jpg" alt="Album 1">
    <div class="album-title">Album 1</div>
  </div>
  <div class="album-thumbnail" data-album="album2">
    <img src="path/to/thumbnail2.jpg" alt="Album 2">
    <div class="album-title">Album 2</div>
  </div>
  <!-- Add more album thumbnails as needed -->
</div>

<div id="fullscreen-gallery" class="fullscreen-gallery">
  <button id="close-gallery" class="close-button">&times;</button>
  <div class="gallery-content">
    <button id="prev-image" class="nav-button prev-button"></button>
    <img id="current-image" src="" alt="Current Image">
    <button id="next-image" class="nav-button next-button"></button>
  </div>
</div>

<script src="gallery.js"></script>
